raw_text: CO-CEO, THE "JILL-OF-ALL-TRADES"        Willing to relocate closer to the company.       Summary     Hands-on Producer effective at bringing projects from a concept to a reality. Expert in personnel and project management with a passion for overseeing an entire production of a great idea morphing it into a great, inspiring and entertaining film, short, or music video.        Summary of Skills     Freelance media production crew member with both on-set and office experience. Extensive experience DSLR's & lighting equipment.    Talented at creating, producing, supervising and budgeting a diverse range of network and independent productions. Detail-orientated and committed to creating high-quality finished products.   Skilled editor with a background in Final Cut Pro 7/X and Adobe Software. Experienced in development, production and post-production with a strong sense of grasping visual aesthetics.   Excels at relationship-building organization and making sound judgment under pressure and within tight deadlines. Marketing Skills, creative strategies, social campaigns, etc.within platforms.
story:
Let me tell you the story of an ambitious multimedia producer who graduated magna cum laude from Morgan State University in 2014 with a BFA in Film/TV Production & Screenwriting. Since then, she's been on quite a journey in the entertainment industry.

Her story really begins with internships during college, where she cut her teeth at various production companies. She worked on everything from managing social media accounts to helping with script breakdowns, and even got hands-on experience with American Idol auditions, handling thousands of hopeful contestants.

After graduation, she took the bold step of co-founding her own production company, where she's been wearing many hats as the self-proclaimed "Jill-of-all-Trades" since 2013. She's been the driving force behind numerous creative projects, handling everything from budgeting to directing, filming, and editing. Her company particularly focuses on creating content that resonates with young audiences aged 13-35.

Throughout her career, she's developed an impressive technical toolkit. She's expertly versed in both Final Cut Pro and Adobe software suites, and she's comfortable behind professional cameras like the Canon EOS series. She's also become quite savvy with social media marketing and branding, continuously updating her skills through online courses.

What makes her story particularly interesting is her hands-on approach to every aspect of production. She's been known to jump from managing corporate clients one day to operating lighting equipment the next. She's even picked up some Spanish and Mandarin along the way, showing her commitment to expanding her horizons.

Her journey shows a clear progression from eager intern to confident professional who can handle any challenge thrown her way in the fast-paced world of media production. She's now looking to bring her comprehensive skill set to a new company, and she's willing to relocate for the right opportunity.

This is a story of someone who's not just looking for a job, but who has consistently demonstrated her passion for turning creative concepts into compelling visual realities.
